parameters.name: doeasy
parameters.description: Should you do the easy problems,

parameters.name: domed
parameters.description: Should you do the medium difficulty problems

parameters.name: dodiff
parameters.description: SHolud you do the hard problmes],

parameters.name: blocksize
parameters.description: Give a pause after this many trials (>68 means no pause)

parameters.name: maxprobs
parameters.description: Do at most only this many problems. They will be mixed between conditions specified by doeasy domed and dodiff

parameters.name: seedrandom
parameters.description: Set this to use the same randomization every time

parameters.name: rngseed
parameters.description: Choose a random number to seed order

parameters.name: givefeedback
parameters.description: Whether to give the correct response when time is up.

parameters.name: allowretry
parameters.description: should you be able to retry until you get correct (and time up)

parameters.name: usecustom
parameters.description: Use a custom file. File should be formatted as a csv with columns word1,word2,word3,answer. It will use maxprobs, but ignore doeasy/dome/dodiff.  rat2.csv is the default, and has 30 problems taken from rat.csv and crap.csv.
